name: Thon_Larimhor
content: Thon Larimhor was a male Zabrak a frequent patron of the Cantina Oceana on the moon of Dorumaa. He hired Rysko Barnt to pose as Kalani's ex-boyfriend to provoke Echari Di'San into attacking Barnt. He then killed Barnt to have Di'San framed for his murder. Larimhor was Kalani's actual boyfriend and had used her in similar schemes before.
